definitions.definition: An East Asian eating utensil usually used as a pair and held in one hand to grip pieces of food or occasionally to mix liquids or scoop up small pieces of food. The utensil is a stick, usually made of wood and measuring approximately 23cm (10 inches) in length.
A long straight stick forming part of various fishing tackle arrangements.

main_definition: ( usually in the plural ) An East Asian eating utensil usually used as a pair and held in one hand to grip pieces of food or occasionally to mix liquids or scoop up small pieces of food. The utensil is a stick, usually made of wood and measuring approximately 23cm (10 inches) in length.
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete , fishing ) A long straight stick forming part of various fishing tackle arrangements.
